content: --अंतरं the period or age of a Manu; this period, according to <ls>Ms. 1. 79</ls>, comprises 4,320,000 human years or one-fourteenth day of Brahmā, the fourteen {%Manvantaras%} making up one whole day; each of these fourteen, periods is supposed to be presided over by its own Manu; six such periods have already passed away; we are at present living in the seventh, and seven more are yet to come.
